name: Vulcan Murder Mystery
description:
This was made in a week or two for Vulcan Jam II. It has some known issues I'm still working out with the UI. It was a learning experience that I'm sharing.

Two murderers have taken advantage of the winter storm, and are hiding among the visitors at Vulcan statue. You must find and execute the murderers before all of the visitors are killed.

Move the cards around to different areas, or execute cards.

 - Press 'continue' to move to the next round

 - The visitor cards move at the start of a round

 - Move the player card to protect an area

 - Murderers pick one victim at a time

 - Play continues until both murderers are executed
